00025 using System;
00026 using MathNet.Numerics.Properties;
00027 
00028 namespace MathNet.Numerics.LinearAlgebra

00030 
00044     [Serializable]
00045     public class LUDecomposition
00046     {
00050         double[][] LU;
00051 
00052         readonly int _rowCount;
00053         readonly int _columnCount;
00054 
00058         int pivsign;
00059 
00063         int[] piv;
00064 
00065         OnDemandComputation<bool> _isNonSingularOnDemand;
00066         OnDemandComputation<Matrix> _lowerTriangularFactorOnDemand;
00067         OnDemandComputation<Matrix> _upperTriangularFactorOnDemand;
00068         OnDemandComputation<int[]> _pivotOnDemand;
00069         OnDemandComputation<Vector> _pivotVectorOnDemand;
00070         OnDemandComputation<Matrix> _permutationMatrixOnDemand;
00071         OnDemandComputation<double> _determinantOnDemand;
00072 
00078         public
00079         LUDecomposition(
00080             Matrix A
00081             )
00082         {
00083             // TODO: it is usually considered as a poor practice to execute algorithms within a constructor.
00084 
00085             // Use a "left-looking", dot-product, Crout/Doolittle algorithm.
00086 
00087             LU = A.Clone();
00088             _rowCount = A.RowCount;
00089             _columnCount = A.ColumnCount;
00090 
00091             piv = new int[_rowCount];
00092             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
00093             {
00094                 piv[i] = i;
00095             }
00096 
00097             pivsign = 1;
00098 
00100             double[] LUcolj = new double[_rowCount];
00101 
00102             // Outer loop.
00103 
00104             for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
00105             {
00106 
00107                 // Make a copy of the j-th column to localize references.
00108 
00109                 for(int i = 0; i < LUcolj.Length; i++)
00110                 {
00111                     LUcolj[i] = LU[i][j];
00112                 }
00113 
00114                 // Apply previous transformations.
00115 
00116                 for(int i = 0; i < LUcolj.Length; i++)
00117                 {
00119 
00120                     // Most of the time is spent in the following dot product.
00121 
00122                     int kmax = Math.Min(i, j);
00123                     double s = 0.0;
00124                     for(int k = 0; k < kmax; k++)
00125                     {
00126                         s += LU[i][k] * LUcolj[k];
00127                     }
00128 
00129                     LU[i][j] = LUcolj[i] -= s;
00130                 }
00131 
00132                 // Find pivot and exchange if necessary.
00133 
00134                 int p = j;
00135 
00136                 for(int i = j + 1; i < LUcolj.Length; i++)
00137                 {
00138                     if(Math.Abs(LUcolj[i]) > Math.Abs(LUcolj[p]))
00139                     {
00140                         p = i;
00141                     }
00142                 }
00143 
00144                 if(p != j)
00145                 {
00146                     for(int k = 0; k < _columnCount; k++)
00147                     {
00148                         double t = LU[p][k];
00149                         LU[p][k] = LU[j][k];
00150                         LU[j][k] = t;
00151                     }
00152 
00153                     int k2 = piv[p];
00154                     piv[p] = piv[j];
00155                     piv[j] = k2;
00156 
00157                     pivsign = -pivsign;
00158                 }
00159 
00160                 // Compute multipliers.
00161 
00162                 if((j < _rowCount) && (LU[j][j] != 0.0))
00163                 {
00164                     for(int i = j + 1; i < _rowCount; i++)
00165                     {
00166                         LU[i][j] /= LU[j][j];
00167                     }
00168                 }
00169             }
00170 
00171             InitOnDemandComputations();
00172         }
00173 
00178         public bool IsNonSingular
00179         {
00180             get { return _isNonSingularOnDemand.Compute(); }
00181         }
00182 
00186         public Matrix L
00187         {
00188             get { return _lowerTriangularFactorOnDemand.Compute(); }
00189         }
00190 
00194         public Matrix U
00195         {
00196             get { return _upperTriangularFactorOnDemand.Compute(); }
00197         }
00198 
00202         public int[] Pivot
00203         {
00204             get { return _pivotOnDemand.Compute(); }
00205         }
00206 
00210         public Vector PivotVector
00211         {
00212             get { return _pivotVectorOnDemand.Compute(); }
00213         }
00214 
00218         public Matrix PermutationMatrix
00219         {
00220             get { return _permutationMatrixOnDemand.Compute(); }
00221         }
00222 
00226         [Obsolete("Use the PivotVector property instead")]
00227         public double[] DoublePivot
00228         {
00229             get { return _pivotVectorOnDemand.Compute(); }
00230         }

00237         public
00238         double
00239         Determinant()
00240         {
00241             // TODO (cdr, 2008-03-11): Change to property
00242             return _determinantOnDemand.Compute();
00243         }
00244 
00252         public
00253         Matrix
00254         Solve(
00255             Matrix B
00256             )
00257         {
00258             if(B.RowCount != _rowCount)
00259             {
00260                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSameRowDimension, "B");
00261             }
00262 
00263             if(!this.IsNonSingular)
00264             {
00265                 throw new InvalidOperationException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixNotSingular);
00266             }
00267 
00268             // Copy right hand side with pivoting
00269             int nx = B.ColumnCount;
00270             Matrix Xmat = B.GetMatrix(piv, 0, nx - 1);
00271             double[][] X = Xmat;
00272 
00273             // Solve L*Y = B(piv,:)
00274             for(int k = 0; k < _columnCount; k++)
00275             {
00276                 for(int i = k + 1; i < _columnCount; i++)
00277                 {
00278                     for(int j = 0; j < nx; j++)
00279                     {
00280                         X[i][j] -= X[k][j] * LU[i][k];
00281                     }
00282                 }
00283             }
00284 
00285             // Solve U*X = Y;
00286             for(int k = _columnCount - 1; k >= 0; k--)
00287             {
00288                 for(int j = 0; j < nx; j++)
00289                 {
00290                     X[k][j] /= LU[k][k];
00291                 }
00292 
00293                 for(int i = 0; i < k; i++)
00294                 {
00295                     for(int j = 0; j < nx; j++)
00296                     {
00297                         X[i][j] -= X[k][j] * LU[i][k];
00298                     }
00299                 }
00300             }
00301 
00302             return Xmat;
00303         }
00304 
00305         void
00306         InitOnDemandComputations()
00307         {
00308             _isNonSingularOnDemand = new OnDemandComputation<bool>(ComputeIsNonSingular);
00309             _lowerTriangularFactorOnDemand = new OnDemandComputation<Matrix>(ComputeLowerTriangularFactor);
00310             _upperTriangularFactorOnDemand = new OnDemandComputation<Matrix>(ComputeUpperTriangularFactor);
00311             _pivotOnDemand = new OnDemandComputation<int[]>(ComputePivot);
00312             _pivotVectorOnDemand = new OnDemandComputation<Vector>(ComputePivotVector);
00313             _permutationMatrixOnDemand = new OnDemandComputation<Matrix>(ComputePermutationMatrix);
00314             _determinantOnDemand = new OnDemandComputation<double>(ComputeDeterminant);
00315         }
00316 
00317         bool
00318         ComputeIsNonSingular()
00319         {
00320             for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
00321             {
00322                 if(LU[j][j] == 0.0)
00323                 {
00324                     return false;
00325                 }
00326             }
00327 
00328             return true;
00329         }
00330 
00331         Matrix
00332         ComputeLowerTriangularFactor()
00333         {
00334             double[][] L = Matrix.CreateMatrixData(_rowCount, _columnCount);
00335             for(int i = 0; i < L.Length; i++)
00336             {
00337                 for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
00338                 {
00339                     if(i > j)
00340                     {
00341                         L[i][j] = LU[i][j];
00342                     }
00343                     else if(i == j)
00344                     {
00345                         L[i][j] = 1.0;
00346                     }
00347                     else
00348                     {
00349                         L[i][j] = 0.0;
00350                     }
00351                 }
00352             }
00353 
00354             return new Matrix(L);
00355         }
00356 
00357         Matrix
00358         ComputeUpperTriangularFactor()
00359         {
00360             double[][] U = Matrix.CreateMatrixData(_columnCount, _columnCount);
00361             for(int i = 0; i < _columnCount; i++)
00362             {
00363                 for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
00364                 {
00365                     if(i <= j)
00366                     {
00367                         U[i][j] = LU[i][j];
00368                     }
00369                     else
00370                     {
00371                         U[i][j] = 0.0;
00372                     }
00373                 }
00374             }
00375 
00376             return new Matrix(U);
00377         }
00378 
00379         int[]
00380         ComputePivot()
00381         {
00382             int[] p = new int[_rowCount];
00383             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
00384             {
00385                 p[i] = piv[i];
00386             }
00387 
00388             return p;
00389         }
00390 
00391         Vector
00392         ComputePivotVector()
00393         {
00394             double[] vals = new double[_rowCount];
00395             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
00396             {
00397                 vals[i] = (double)piv[i];
00398             }
00399 
00400             return new Vector(vals);
00401         }
00402 
00403         Matrix
00404         ComputePermutationMatrix()
00405         {
00406             int[] pivot = Pivot;
00407             double[][] perm = Matrix.CreateMatrixData(pivot.Length, pivot.Length);
00408             for(int i = 0; i < pivot.Length; i++)
00409             {
00410                 perm[pivot[i]][i] = 1.0;
00411             }
00412 
00413             return new Matrix(perm);
00414         }
00415 
00416         double
00417         ComputeDeterminant()
00418         {
00419             if(_rowCount != _columnCount)
00420             {
00421                 throw new System.ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSquare);
00422             }
00423 
00424             double d = (double)pivsign;
00425             for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
00426             {
00427                 d *= LU[j][j];
00428             }
00429 
00430             return d;
00431         }
00432     }
